# Home Page
### A Commentary (by Imam Jalal al-Din al-Mahalli) on the Foundational Primer in Usul al-Fiqh in the Shafi'i Madhhab authored by Imam al-Haramain al-Juwayni   
**(c) 2025 L.A Hussein**

This project is a work-in-progress collection of notes and commentary based on the lectures of [**Sheikh Abdullahi Shire **](https://www.instagram.com/abdullahishire_/?hl=en), may Allah protect and preserve him, where he is an instructor and co-founder of [**Miraath Institute**](https://www.instagram.com/miraathinstitute/?hl=en). In the current course, we are covering **Sharh Matn al-Waraqat**, a foundational text on Usul in the **Shafi'i madhhab**.

[**Click here to access the original Arabic text (PDF) from the publishing house Dar al-Taiba**](https://archive.org/details/20241220_20241220_2248/page/n1/mode/2up)
